name: Blackbird - Barber Pole - Toro
additionalNotes: The Blackbird Barber Pole is a medium-strength cigar that is beautifully handcrafted in the Dominican Republic. It is made with tobacco from four countries. It features two contrasting wrappers: a dark Mexican San Andres and a light-brown USA Connecticut Shade. Both wrappers are wrapped around an Indonesian binder, which contains premium fillers from the Dominican Republic, USA Pennsylvania and Nicaragua.Â
